4316980.name: Darkrite: The Blight of Love Demo
4316980.description:
See through the eyes of a knight whose order has long been forgotten…

What's in the demo:
The demo shows part of one location and introduces the main game’s themes, mechanics, atmosphere, and central conflict.

What’s not in the demo:

  • All locations, plotlines, and abilities

  • The full depth and dynamism of Weaver combat (these are taught gradually)

  • The complete tension and narrative

  • Final polish and finishing touches

What's in the full game:

Darkrite: The Blight of Love tells two intertwined stories that explore tragic grief, generational trauma, and depression.

This game is made for fellow fans of old-school RPGs who prefer focused storytelling; the game aims to respect your time while stirring the mind and heart.

features:

  • Developed by a heartbroken person

  • Play as a visual novel - or - with paced ARPG combat: old school but with some twists

  • Retro RPG graphics inspired by love for games like Ultima, Diablo, the original Baldur's Gate

  • A serious, literary tone but... (see next bullet)

  • An unlikely vampire ally - who makes subtle game references (hint cough Adoring Fan cough) but has character development crucial to the entire story

  • A small, focused setting that doesn't meander in its worldbuilding

  • Hints at the larger Darkrite lore which started as a tabletop campaign still going today

  • Meant to "feel" like a fantasy novel

  • Handcrafted, intentional writing

  • Foreshadows a planned expansion with a style change I think you'll enjoy
